echo.desc: repeats a message in the specified text channel

tag.desc: sends/creates a tag containing a given message

tagdelete.desc: deletes the specified tag if it exists

taglist.desc: lists every tag in the server

welcome.desc: sets the welcome message for the server, and the channel that the message will be sent in (use `{user}` in place of where you want the bot to mention the person who's joining)

join.desc: makes the bot join a voice channel

leave.desc: makes the bot leave a voice channel

play.desc: plays the youtube video specified (the bot will join the vc automatically). add an asterisk at the end of the query to select a video from a list of search results

queue.desc: lists all of the tracks in the queue

skip.desc: skips either the current track, a queued track (index), or every queued track (all)

nowplaying.desc: shows information about the current track

loopcount.desc: shows how many times the current track has been played, if it's being looepd

shuffle.desc: shuffles the order of the queue

playlist.desc: lists every playlist, as well as other related commands

seek.desc: skips to a specific point in the current track (use `+/-[time]` to fast forward or rewind by the amount of time)

jpeg.desc: lowers the quality of the given image

imgaudio.desc: converts an image into a video (and adds audio via a youtube link or mp3 file)

caption.desc: captions the specified gif or image in the style of an iFunny caption

resize.desc: resizes the given gif/image/video (and optionally changes the bitrate, if it's a video)

get.desc: downloads a youtube video (and optionally trims the beginning/end of it)

reply.desc: replies to a given tweet using its id (or the latest tweet)

profile.desc: replaces the profile/banner of [@funnymuseumtwt](https://twitter.com/funnymuseumtwt) with the given image
